about_the_game:
The official soundtrack to Mask of the Rose, composed by Laurence Chapman.

Credits


Violins: Elaine Ambridge & Elise Harper
Violas: Jess Tickle & Jordan Bowron
Cello: Rachel Shakespeare
Clarinets: Tom Evans
Bassoon: Alice Braithwaite
Harp: Olivia Jageurs
Piano: Laurence Chapman
Recording Engineer: Richard Brooker

Score recorded at Brookspeare Music Studio
